item.title: AI vs. AI: 6 ways enterprises are automating cybersecurity to counter AI-powered attacks
item.description: AI-powered cybersecurity threats include deepfakes, automating breaches, and morphing malware in real time, challenging cyberdefenses.

item.title: CRM provider Creatio launches first ‘AI native’ platform with agentic digital talent built-in
item.description: Creatio unveiled a new CRM paradigm that puts a prompt entry box front and center, allowing the user to simply type in what they need.

item.title: AMD unveils 5th Gen Epyc embedded processors for networking, storage and industrial edge
item.description: AMD announced the expansion of its x86 embedded processor portfolio with the introduction of 5th Gen AMD Epyc Embedded processors.
